title: #277 - Joe Fletcher, Architectural Photographer
itunes:title: #277 - Joe Fletcher, Architectural Photographer
description:
This week David and Marina are joined by Joe Fletcher, Architectural Photographer to discuss his transition from painting to photography; his experience with a formalized education in photography; how an architectural photographer can influence architects and architecture; his process; the distillation of architecture through photography; why photogenic buildings are not always comfortable to be in; and more. This episode is supported by Brizo • Monograph • Miele • Graphisoft
